data.title: Global Business Travel Association
data.text:
Invest in yourself with GBTA Academy

Have you already achieved your individual professional development goals this year? It’s not too late! Check out GBTA Academy course dates in 2024 and register for the one that suits your goals and schedule.

Annual Global Report & Forecast

GBTA 2024 Business Travel Index Outlook

GBTA BTI™ is an exhaustive forecast of business travel preferences, behaviors, spending, and growth covering 72 countries and 44 industries. It includes survey data and analysis from 4,100 business travelers across five global regions.

The Global Equity Program

Together, we can welcome new and diverse voices into the global business travel community

GBTA Canada Business Travel Forums 2024

Reserve your spot at our one-day premier business travel industry educational and networking events, taking place in four Canadian cities.

GBTA +VDR Conference 2024 in Partnership with the Nordic Business Travel Associations | Copenhagen

4-6 November, Bella Center Copenhagen

Sign up now for the lowest registration rate

GBTA U.S. Economic Impact Study

Business Travel’s Impact on Jobs and the U.S. Economy

Learn about the economic contribution made by business travel to the U.S. economy and understand the profile of business travelers in terms of their composition, behavior, motivations, and spending patterns.

Membership – Why Join GBTA

Member Benefits including Networking, Industry Research, On Demand Content (HUB), Professional Development and lots more.

Community

Community building is an essential component

of GBTA’s mission.

Learning

GBTA is the hub for the business travel industry to come together to grow their career and travel program.

Advocacy

With members from across the world, GBTA has the privilege and duty to represent the many varied voices of the global business travel community.

Our Commitment

As the business travel industry’s largest member-focused organization, we seek to provide the learning, community building, and advocacy the industry needs to continue to evolve and thrive.

Featured Events

GBTA +VDR Supplier Summit 2024 in Partnership with the Nordic Business Travel Associations | Copenhagen

Join us for GBTA +VDR Supplier Summit 2024 in Partnership with the Nordic Business Travel Associations | Copenhagen, Denmark and learn about updates for this year’s conference, how you can…

Learn More

GBTA WINiT Gala 2024

The goal of the WINiT Awards is to recognize the women, men, and companies who together are driving positive change for the career mobility of women in the travel-related industries….

Learn More
